description:
The giant Lucasite appears in Leviatan`s village again, menacing the town.
Leviatan and Jörmungand are raring to go, but Bahamut has not regained her will to fight.
Telling her they believe she will come, Leviatan and Jörmungand leave Bahamut to fight...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 絶対防衛しちゃうもん!
